title: Appeal of Six-Week Abortion Ban Injunction Bounced by Ohio Court
description: Abortions after the sixth week of pregnancy are legal in Ohio for now, after a state appeals court refused to overturn an order precluding the state’s enforcement of a “heartbeat” ban while its constitutionality is being litigated.

Wade while canvassing in Trenton, Ohio, on Oct. 23, 2022.  MEGAN JELINGER/AFP via Getty Images PrintEmailShare To:FacebookLinkedInDecember 16, 2022, 6:37 PM UTCAppeal of Six-Week Abortion Ban Injunction Bounced by Ohio CourtBy Mary Anne Pazanowski Mary Anne Pazanowski Legal ReporterFederal court block on Ohio’s six-week ban lifted after DobbsOhio can still appeal if trial court permanently enjoins lawAbortions after the sixth week of pregnancy are legal in Ohio for now, after a state appeals court refused to overturn an order precluding the state’s enforcement of a “heartbeat” ban while its constitutionality is being litigated.Ohio’s appeals courts have very limited jurisdiction to review interim, or nonfinal, decisions, the Ohio Court of Appeals, First District, said Friday. And this case, where a trial judge <-bsp-article-citation state="{"cms.site.owner":{"_ref":"00000166-e5a9-d785-a767-fffdcac50000","_type":"00000151-acf5-d1ce-a159-bff728d6001e"},"cms.content.publishDate":1671214456040,"cms.content.publishUser":{"_ref":"00000155-792f-d88e-a7d5-7b2fadc40000","_type":"00000151-acf5-d1ce-a159-bff728d8001b"},"cms.content.updateDate":1671214456040,"cms.content.updateUser":{"_ref":"00000155-792f-d88e-a7d5-7b2fadc40000","_type":"00000151-acf5-d1ce-a159-bff728d8001b"},"articleCitation":{"_id":"00000185-1c23-d9df-a9f7-deb3d7d00000","_type":"00000160-bca2-df03-a1ef-bcef37330000"},"_id":"00000185-1c23-d9df-a9f7-deb3d7ca0000","_type":"00000160-bca2-df03-a1ef-bcef37350000"}">paused the law’s enforcement to preserve the status quo pending an outcome on the merits, didn’t meet that standard, it said in dismissing the appeal.The six-week ban requires physicians to perform an ultrasound ...
